name: Elementary luck 06
description:
Generative art created by Eko33.

Official wallet: eko33.tez
Official Website: https://www.eko33.com/ 
Official Twitter account: https://twitter.com/eko3316 
Official Instagram account: https://www.instagram.com/eko33studio/

PNG 2000 x 2000

New evolution of the "Elementary Luck XX" series, we have more entropy going on, and I've tried to find the right balance between chaos and figuration.

At first glance, you may not see the pyramid at the bottom, and then when you see it, you can't unsee it anymore.

My custom algorithm is also producing a delicate render with an organic feel. I love geometry produced by algorithms, but I also love the overall look and feel of an artwork, hence my attention to detail when it comes to the final render of each work to make it unique.

I've always been fascinated by the dissolution of core and fundamental values in our society. I'm trying to illustrate these slow yet unstoppable societal changes by using primary shapes like squares and triangles.
